sentences.english: As with the Wal-Mart dream, I know better.
sentences.chinese: 就像谁人沃尔玛的梦那样，我就晓得。

sentences.english: In addition, Wal-Mart China Human Resources Senior Vice President Wang Yujia resigns.
sentences.chinese: 此外，沃尔玛中国人力资源高级副总裁王渝佳已辞职。

sentences.english: Wal-Mart’s and Costco’s private labels only use cage-free eggs.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔玛和科斯克的自有品牌都只使用散养鸡蛋。

sentences.english: Material: China fir or pinewood. It was sold at WalMart in America before.
sentences.chinese: 杉木，松木制作，曾在美国沃尔玛超市销售。

sentences.english: Wal-Mart would give her the money back, less $10.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔玛将把她所付的钱不到10%还给她。

sentences.english: We will oppose the setting up of any Walmart stores in the W /Cape.
sentences.chinese: 工会将反对在西开普省建立任何沃尔玛的分店。

sentences.english: But Cude says Wal-Mart has found the antidote.
sentences.chinese: 但Cude说沃尔玛公司已经找到了解药。

sentences.english: Opportunities exist for Wis-Mpower to continue with its current strdinedgy of large- super centres.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔玛的机缘存在于对现有大型超市战略的对峙。

sentences.english: Ms. Li declined to divulge the value of the investment by Wal-Mart, the world's leading retailer.
sentences.chinese: 李静拒绝透露沃尔玛这个世界零售巨头所投资的数额。

sentences.english: Can Albertsons Trounce Wal-Mart with Advanced Information Technology?
sentences.chinese: 可以艾伯森痛打沃尔玛先进的信息技术沃尔玛？

sentences.english: Can Albertsons Trounce Wal-Mart with Advanced Information Technology?
sentences.chinese: 可以艾伯森痛打沃尔玛先进的信息技术沃尔玛？

sentences.english: Since then, Walmart relaunched it's online music store on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 周二，沃尔玛重新开放了他们的在线音乐商店。

sentences.english: Walmart and Target have also signed up.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔玛和塔吉特也签署了同样的承诺书。

sentences.english: Almost all of the people who worked for Wal-Mart owned some of its stock.
sentences.chinese: 几乎所有为沃尔玛工作的人都拥有一些该公司的股份。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court should give the women of Wal-Mart a chance to make their case together.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院应该给予沃尔玛的女员工们集体诉讼的机会。

sentences.english: Today, when I left Walmart, it was very dark outside.
sentences.chinese: 今天，当我离开沃尔玛时外面很暗。

definition: CR Vanguard or China Resources Vanguard Shop, a supermarket chain in Hong Kong and mainland China
supermarket/abbr. for 超級市場|超级市场/CL:家[jia1]
Ali Baba, character from The Arabian Nights
